name: Ball Pin
description:
Like the game Planko, you can only determine where you drop the ball.

Similar to the game Connect-Four, you have to hit four pins to pass a level.

Like the hot/cold game, refer to the colors of the pins, to find the winning combination.

Going camping and want to take this game with you? Suspect that your internet will be getting shut off in the near future? Support me by downloading this game so that I can create new titles! (Play stand alone version in resolution 1024x768)
